attributes.action: Insist that Theresa May's government prorogue parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
https://twitter.com/Jacob_Rees_Mogg/status/1108687643661996033 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=63IcW4eo4uM  https://twitter.com/VobeShy/status/1112002743756038144 
They intend 2 use our Great British isle 2 make us a dumping ground for all the problems of their creation while all the time using us as their bank of convenience.  Ensuring this GB isle is no more than a slave 2 the EU, 2 their fiscal tyranny, their super_army ambition & overturn the advances made and fought for over 2 World Wars.
attributes.background: Since Article 50 was triggered Theresa May & MPs have deliberately & contemptuously done all they can 2 undermine the democratic vote of the people & stop brexit.  https://twitter.com/profsked/status/1112790977926791168
